title: Ozempic® (semaglutide) injection for Type 2 Diabetes
description: Ozempic® (semaglutide) injection is a once-weekly GLP-1 RA medicine that, along with diet and exercise, may help improve blood sugar in adults with type 2 diabetes. Read Important Safety Information, including Boxed Warning.
cleaned_text: Actor portrayal. Monica has type 2 diabetes and known heart disease. For adults with type 2 diabetes Discover the Ozempic® Tri-Zone Once-weekly prescription Ozempic®, along with diet and exercise, lowers blood sugar in adults with type 2 diabetes. Scroll below to "What is Ozempic®?" for Limitations of Use. Ozempic® brings you My Type 2 Transformation, a support program that offers guidance from experts to help you transform the way you manage your type 2 diabetes: Additional resources to help you manage your type 2 diabetes Whether you're taking Ozempic® or just looking for additional support, there are videos and downloadable resources that can help you better manage your type 2 diabetes.
